mapper.select: SELECT B.no, B.title, B.content, B.hit, B.reg_date regDate, B.user_no userNo, U.name userName FROM board B, users U WHERE B.user_no = U.no ORDER BY B.no asc
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board VALUES (seq_board_no.nextval, #{title, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{content, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 0, sysdate, #{userNo, jdbcType=INTEGER})
